entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
